## Description The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." It features the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently. ## K 2 BATTERY SET Inklusive 36-V-Wechselakku und Ladegerät: der leistungsstarke Akku-Hochdruckreiniger K 2 Battery für vielseitige, flexible Einsätze ohne Stromanschluss. ## Description The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer with several components. The main unit has a handle at the top for easy carrying. It features a prominent brand logo on the front. The design is compact and vertical, with a sturdy base for stability. ### Components 1. **Main Unit**: - Color: Yellow and black. - Features: Handle for portability, brand logo on the front. - Design: Compact and vertical. 2. **Accessories**: - Two pressure wands: - One with a standard nozzle. - One with a more focused, possibly turbo nozzle. - A charger with a plug, indicating the device may be battery-operated. ### Context This pressure washer is likely designed for home use, suitable for cleaning tasks such as washing cars, patios, or outdoor furniture. The inclusion of different nozzles suggests versatility in cleaning applications. The compact design implies ease of storage and transport. ### Key-Value Pair - **Bestell-Nr.**: 1.117-220.0 ## Text Content - Akkubetrieben, Akku und Ladegerät mit Lieferumfang enthalten - Kompatibel mit der 36 V Kärcher Battery Power-Plattform - Hochdruckreiniger inkl. Pistole mit Druckstufenanzeige ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278305165
Akku-Gerät 1
Akkupattform 36-V-Akkuplattform
Druck max. 110 bar
Druckbereich Hochdruck
Fördermenge 340 l/h
Zulauftemperatur max. 40 °C
Akkutyp Lithium-Ionen-Wechselakku
Spannung 36 V
Kapazität Ah
Laufzeit je Akkuladung min 14 (5,0 Ah)
Akkuladedauer mit Standardladegerät min 90
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4,5
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 8,5
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 245 × 303 × 629
## Ausstattung
Variante Akku und Ladegerät inbegriffen
Akku 36 V / 5.0 Ah Battery
Power-Akku (1 Stück)
Ladegerät 36 V Battery
Power-Standardladegerät (1 Stück)
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q Boost
1-fach-Strahlrohr
Dreckfräser
HD-Schlauch 4 m
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect
Reinigungsmittel-einsatz über Ansaugschlauch
Integrierter Wasserfilter
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4"
## Made in Germany ## Description The image is a simple icon representing a battery with the text "36V" inside it. The battery icon is stylized and appears to be a graphical representation rather than a real battery. The background is a gradient of gray, with the top part being lighter and the bottom part darker. The text "36V" is centered within the battery icon, indicating a voltage level of 36 volts. There are no additional labels, legends, or annotations present in the image. ## Description The image is a symbol with a yellow outline of a battery and a clock on a black background. Below the symbol, the text "AKKU INBEGRIFFEN" is written in yellow capital letters. - **Symbol Details**: - The battery icon is depicted with a plus and minus sign, indicating the positive and negative terminals. - A clock face is integrated into the battery design, suggesting a time-related feature or function. - **Text**: - "AKKU INBEGRIFFEN" translates to "Battery Included" in English, indicating that the product or item associated with this symbol comes with a battery.

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." It features the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently.

## K 2 BATTERY SET

Inklusive 36-V-Wechselakku und Ladegerät: der leistungsstarke Akku-Hochdruckreiniger K 2 Battery für vielseitige, flexible Einsätze ohne Stromanschluss.

## Description

The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer with several components. The main unit has a handle at the top for easy carrying. It features a prominent brand logo on the front. The design is compact and vertical, with a sturdy base for stability.

### Components

1. **Main Unit**: 
   - Color: Yellow and black.
   - Features: Handle for portability, brand logo on the front.
   - Design: Compact and vertical.

2. **Accessories**:
   - Two pressure wands: 
     - One with a standard nozzle.
     - One with a more focused, possibly turbo nozzle.
   - A charger with a plug, indicating the device may be battery-operated.

### Context

This pressure washer is likely designed for home use, suitable for cleaning tasks such as washing cars, patios, or outdoor furniture. The inclusion of different nozzles suggests versatility in cleaning applications. The compact design implies ease of storage and transport.

## Text Content

- Akkubetrieben, Akku und Ladegerät mit Lieferumfang enthalten
- Kompatibel mit der 36 V Kärcher Battery Power-Plattform
- Hochdruckreiniger inkl. Pistole mit Druckstufenanzeige

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278305165
Akku-Gerät 1
Akkupattform 36-V-Akkuplattform
Druck max. 110 bar
Druckbereich Hochdruck
Fördermenge 340 l/h
Zulauftemperatur max. 40 °C
Akkutyp Lithium-Ionen-Wechselakku
Spannung 36 V
Kapazität Ah
Laufzeit je Akkuladung min 14 (5,0 Ah)
Akkuladedauer mit Standardladegerät min 90
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4,5
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 8,5
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 245 × 303 × 629

## Ausstattung
Variante Akku und Ladegerät inbegriffen
Akku 36 V / 5.0 Ah Battery
Power-Akku (1 Stück)
Ladegerät 36 V Battery
Power-Standardladegerät (1 Stück)
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q Boost
1-fach-Strahlrohr
Dreckfräser
HD-Schlauch 4 m
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect
Reinigungsmittel-einsatz über Ansaugschlauch
Integrierter Wasserfilter
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4"

## Description

The image is a simple icon representing a battery with the text "36V" inside it. The battery icon is stylized and appears to be a graphical representation rather than a real battery. The background is a gradient of gray, with the top part being lighter and the bottom part darker. The text "36V" is centered within the battery icon, indicating a voltage level of 36 volts. There are no additional labels, legends, or annotations present in the image.

## Description

The image is a symbol with a yellow outline of a battery and a clock on a black background. Below the symbol, the text "AKKU INBEGRIFFEN" is written in yellow capital letters.

- **Symbol Details**:
  - The battery icon is depicted with a plus and minus sign, indicating the positive and negative terminals.
  - A clock face is integrated into the battery design, suggesting a time-related feature or function.

- **Text**:
  - "AKKU INBEGRIFFEN" translates to "Battery Included" in English, indicating that the product or item associated with this symbol comes with a battery.
